import { useCookies } from 'react-cookie' import './header.css' import { useState } from 'react' export default function Header() { const [cookie, setCookie] = useCookies() const [user, setUser] = useState(cookie.user == 'undefied' ? 'Đăng nhập' : cookie.user ) console.log(user) return (
{ user }
) }
